meanings.definition: A person who owns or is involved in the management of an industry.
meanings.sent1: The wealthy industrialist built many factories in the city.
meanings.sent2: The industrialist was responsible for overseeing the production of goods.
meanings.sent3: The industrious industrialist always had new ideas for improving efficiency.
meanings.sent4: She was an industrialist in the world of fashion, creating trends and styles.
meanings.sent5: The determined industrialist worked tirelessly to expand their business empire.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to industry or the people involved in it.
meanings.sent1: The industrialist sector saw significant growth last year.
meanings.sent2: Her industrialist mindset focused on innovation and progress.
meanings.sent3: The industrialist machinery hummed with productivity in the factory.
meanings.sent4: His industrialist approach to problem-solving was both practical and effective.
meanings.sent5: The industrialist atmosphere of the conference was filled with excitement and ambition.
